hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that ##the Ice Cavern## has #2# major items.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Bolero of Fire#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's left hand# is #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: Try using various items and weapons on me :)

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #chests past Dark Link# in the Water Temple hold...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Map of the Ice Cavern#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Ruto's Letter# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that in the #crater, a spider in a crate and a single scrub# guard...^ #an Ice Trap# and #a Fire Temple Compass#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that plundering #Lake Hylia# is a foolish choice.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##the Graveyard## has #2# major items.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Zora's River# is a foolish choice.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that Lon Lon Ranch prospered under Ingo.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #1# major item.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Song of Storms#.
